docs.text: HOME foniby.xyz Lua Api docs Loading Lua script Drop script into C:\fonibylua folder. Click refresh in actions list on cheat menu. Select the script from list and press load script .
docs.title: HOME

docs.text: Drop script into C:\fonibylua folder. Click refresh in actions list on cheat menu. Select the script from list and press load script .
docs.title: Loading Lua script

docs.text: game_engine game_engine functions game_engine.local_player_index returns local player index. game_engine.get_max_clients returns get max clients. game_engine.get_player_for_user_id Type Name int userid game_engine.get_view_angles returns view angles. Type Name int pitch int yaw int roll game_engine.is_connected returns false or true. game_engine.is_in_game returns false or true game_engine.set_view_angles sets view angles Type Name int x int y int z base_player base_player functions base_player.get_health returns entities health. Type Name C_BasePlayer entity base_player.get_velocity returns entities velocity. base_player.get_name returns entities name. base_player.get_team_num returns team_num. base_player.get_active_weapon_name returns name active weapon. base_player.is_alive returns true or false. base_player.get_local_player returns local player.
docs.title: game_engine
